attributes.description:
If you are reading this, it means you are now where you are supposed to be. You have worked hard and endlessly to find yourself in a position to buy your next vehicle. For most, buying a car is the most expensive purchase ever, so do it at a dealership you can trust and give you sound advice. At Mossel Bay VW, we are more than selling cars. We pride ourselves in giving our best for customer satisfaction and believe in building lifelong friendships and long-term business.

We do nation-wide deliveries and use several finance houses to ensure that you get the best deal.
	
Feel free to contact any of our well-trained sales professionals to assist you with your next purchase
Geeno Du Plessis 
Dian Weideman 
Stuart Pypers 
Damiane Scott

Please feel free to contact us for any more info.
